about.title: Trusted Gold Loan Partners Since 2023
about.overview: Founded in 2023, we've rapidly grown to become Odisha's fastest-growing gold loan provider with 20 branches and ₹230+ crores Assets Under Management (AUM). Our customer-first approach and transparent processes have helped over 15,000 families unlock the value of their gold assets.

founding.title: Humble Beginnings
founding.description: Started in April 2023 with a single branch in Bhubaneswar, focusing on fair gold valuation and quick disbursals.

fact1.title: First Month Achievement
fact1.detail: Disbursed ₹2.5 crores to 120 customers in our first month

fact2.title: Core Philosophy
fact2.detail: Built on three pillars: Gold Security, Fast Processing, and Fair Valuation

expansion.title: Odisha Expansion
expansion.description: In just 18 months, we've established a strong presence across 20 strategic locations:

aum.title: Financial Milestone
aum.description: Achieved ₹230 Crore AUM through trust-building measures and competitive interest rates starting at 0.79% per month.
aum.subtext: Serving 500+ customers monthly with 98% renewal rate

journey.title: Our Gold Journey
journey.description: From a single branch to becoming one of the most trusted gold loan providers in the region, our growth reflects our commitment to customer satisfaction.

loanServices.title: Gold Loan Services
loanServices.subtitle: Fast, secure, and affordable gold loans tailored to your needs

quickApproval.title: Quick Loan Approval
quickApproval.description: Get funds within hours with our streamlined process
quickApproval.detail1: Unigold ensures that we have the best loan options available to our clients to ensure ease during a financial emergency. We understand that while applying for loans, people generally face tons of hurdles which make the entire process more tedious.
quickApproval.detail2: Our customers have an option to avail themselves of a gold loan, one of the easiest ways to secure every loan in India. And in no time, you will have access to funds.
quickApproval.detail3: Be it an urgent medical case, a tuition fee payment, or funds needed for business expansion, we guarantee quick service with minimal documentation.

interestRates.title: Competitive Interest Rates
interestRates.description: Lowest gold loan rates with no hidden charges
interestRates.detail1: When it is a question of gold loans, affordability is important. We provide some of the best interest rates on gold loans in the industry.
interestRates.detail2: Our open pricing strategy helps prevent there being any hidden fees and ensures that our gold loans are one of the lowest cost borrowing options in the market.
interestRates.detail3: Whatever the size of your loan, from a small loan to a larger loan, our low interest rate makes it simpler and easier to repay.

repayment.title: Flexible Repayment Options
repayment.description: Choose a repayment plan that fits your finances
repayment.detail1: At Unigold Finance, we provide customizable gold loan repayment plans that fit your financial situation. We believe that repayment should be as stress-free as borrowing.
repayment.detail2: Whether you prefer monthly instalments, quarterly payments, or a lump-sum repayment at the end of the loan tenure, we've got you covered.
repayment.detail3: Our customized repayment plans are designed to align with your cash flow, ensuring you never feel burdened by your loan obligations.

vaultStorage.title: Secure Vault Storage
vaultStorage.description: Bank-grade security for your precious gold
vaultStorage.detail1: Your gold is precious, and at Unigold Finance, we treat it with the utmost care. Our secure vault storage facilities are equipped with state-of-the-art security features.
vaultStorage.detail2: All pledged gold is fully insured, providing you with complete peace of mind. Whether you're pledging family heirlooms or investment gold, you can trust Unigold Finance.
vaultStorage.detail3: Our commitment to safety and transparency ensures that your gold is in the best hands with 24/7 surveillance and biometric access.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.maxLoanQuestion: What is the maximum loan amount I can get against my gold?
faq.maxLoanAnswer: You can get up to 75% of the gold's market value as loan amount.
faq.valuationQuestion: How is the gold valuation done?
faq.valuationAnswer: Our certified appraisers evaluate gold purity using advanced testing methods and weigh it to determine exact value.
faq.earlyRepaymentQuestion: Can I repay the loan before the tenure ends?
faq.earlyRepaymentAnswer: Yes, you can prepay anytime with minimal foreclosure charges after 3 months.

faq1.question: What documents do I need for a gold loan?
faq1.answer: You need your ID proof (Aadhaar, PAN, Voter ID), address proof, and gold ornaments with purity certificate.

faq2.question: How long does loan approval take?
faq2.answer: Our gold loans are approved within 30 minutes after document verification and gold appraisal.

faq3.question: Can I repay my loan early?
faq3.answer: Yes, you can repay your loan anytime before the due date. We offer interest rebates for early repayment.

founding.title: Foundation of UniGold
founding.description: UniGold Finance Company was established with a vision to provide affordable gold loans to the people of Odisha. Our first branch opened in Bhubaneswar with a small team of dedicated professionals.

expansion.title: Statewide Expansion
expansion.description: Launched our innovative gold loan products with flexible repayment options. Expanded to all 30 districts of Odisha.

present.title: Leading Gold Loan Provider
present.description: Today, UniGold is Odisha's most trusted gold loan company with over 50 branches. We continue to innovate with customer-centric products while maintaining our core values.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

questions.q1: How do I apply for a gold loan?
questions.q2: What is the interest rate for gold loans?
questions.q3: How is the gold value calculated?
questions.q4: What happens if I miss a repayment?
questions.q5: How can I check my loan balance?

answers.a1: You can apply for a gold loan through our website, mobile app, or by visiting any of our branches. You will need to bring your gold items for valuation and provide valid identification documents.
answers.a2: Our gold loan interest rates start at 12% per annum and vary based on the loan amount and tenure. Current rates are displayed on our website and app.
answers.a3: Gold value is calculated based on the current market price, purity of your gold (measured in karats), and weight. Our certified appraisers will assess your gold items.
answers.a4: Late payments may incur penalties. If you anticipate difficulty in repayment, please contact our customer service immediately to discuss restructuring options.
answers.a5: You can check your loan balance through our mobile app, online banking portal, or by contacting our customer service.
